name: Dave the Space Pirate
description:
Oh no! Dave has crashed on a strange planet! Collect the parts and chase the Big Guy across multiple islands to fix his ship and get back to adventuring! If you want a challenge, each island also has a hidden star to find.

Controls

This game is controlled entirely with the mouse:
Left click: Jump
Right click: Run/Walk
Scroll wheel: Toggle run/walk
Middle click: Pause menu

Credits

Music: Pinofas/LukHash
Pirate and goblin models: Quaternius
Landscape: Quaternius
Rocket: Kenney

Known Bugs There is an issue with the Godot 4 particle system that causes flashing artefacts to appear on screen.

At the moment you need to click on the dialogue box to progress it.
